FuncDef: The Maximum Burst Size (mbs) command specifies the relative amount of the buffer pool space for the maximum buffers for a specific HSMDA queue.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the size of the MBS for the HSMDA queue. Values-0 to 2688000 (for bytes).
Identifies the size value in terms of bytes.
Identifies the size value in terms of kilobytes.
Specifies the size of the MBS to be the default value configured on the system.
